languages.text:
"...Но зверь не повержен покуда.
С рыком метнул он в схватку тело свое,
Словно копье, устремленное сильной рукою.
С визгом прорезали когти адамантиум,
Витязи бились, кровь проливая рекою.
Ратную песню запел Громогласный Ульфар,
Черным проклятьем ему вторил злобный соперник.
Витязи бились, когда хитроумн{mf|ый|о} эттфатер..."

"...But the beast was not yet vanquished.
Roaring, his body he threw
into the fray
like a mighty spear-thrust,
Howling, his claws cut through the adamantine,
The warriors fought,
a river of blood spilling.
Ulfar Thunderlung,
his battle song singing,
The black curse
his vicious rival echoing.
The warriors were clashing
when the cunning Aett-Vater..."
languages.original_text:
"...Но зверь не повержен покуда.
С рыком метнул он в схватку тело свое,

languages.text:
「…しかし、獣はまだ立っていた。
咆哮を上げながら
槍で突き刺すように
戦いに身を投じた
雄叫びとともに鉤爪でアダマンチウムを切り裂き
戦士たちは戦い
血の川が流された。
ウルファー・サンダーラング
彼の戦歌が歌われる
黒き呪い
凶暴な宿敵が反響する。
戦士たちは激突すると
狡猾なアエット＝ヴァテルは…」
languages.original_text:
"...But the beast was not yet vanquished.
Roaring, his body he threw
into the fray

The warriors were clashing
when the cunning Aett-Vater..."

狡猾なアエット＝ヴァテルは…」

languages.text:
“……但野兽尚未被征服。
他大吼一声，
像一支强力的长矛，
挥舞着以削铁如泥的利爪，
投身于混战之中。
战士们赴死如归，
脚下早已血流成河。
乌尔法·雷狼，
高唱着勇猛的圣歌，
邪恶的敌人，
亦报以黑暗的毒詈。
就在这一场惨烈的血战中，
聪慧的狼领……”
languages.original_text:
"...But the beast was not yet vanquished.
Roaring, his body he threw
into the fray
like a mighty spear-thrust,
Howling, his claws cut through the adamantine,
The warriors fought,

The black curse
his vicious rival echoing.
The warriors were clashing
when the cunning Aett-Vater..."

聪慧的狼领……”

languages.text:
« ... Mais la bête n'était pas encore vaincue.
Rugissante, elle se lança
à l'attaque
telle une lance implacable.
Hurlante, ses griffes lacèrent l'adamantine,
et dans un torrent de sang versé
les guerriers lui livrèrent bataille.
Au chant de bataille
d'Ulfar Voix-du-Tonnerre
fit écho la noire malédiction
de son cruel rival.
Le combat faisait rage
quand l'habile aett-vater... »
languages.original_text:
"...But the beast was not yet vanquished.
Roaring, his body he threw
into the fray
like a mighty spear-thrust,
Howling, his claws cut through the adamantine,
The warriors fought,
a river of blood spilling.
Ulfar Thunderlung,
his battle song singing,
The black curse
his vicious rival echoing.
The warriors were clashing
when the cunning Aett-Vater..."

traits.locale_text:
« ... Mais la bête n'était pas encore vaincue.
Rugissante, elle se lança
à l'attaque

Hurlante, ses griffes lacèrent l'adamantium,
et dans un torrent de sang versé
les guerriers lui livrèrent bataille. »
Au chant de bataille
d'Ulfar Voix-du-Tonnerre
fit écho la noire malédiction
de son cruel rival.
Le combat faisait rage
quand l'habile aett-vater... »

languages.text:
«... Pero la bestia aún vivía.
Con un rugido, se abalanzó
a la refriega
como una jabalina endiablada.
Sus garras atravesaron el blindaje adamantino,
los guerreros se enfrentaron
y un río de sangre derramaron.
Ulfar Pulmón Atronador,
canción de guerra en los labios,
y con negras maldiciones
se hace eco su enemigo.
Mientras los luchadores combatían,
{mf|el|la} astut{mf|o|a} Aett-Vater...».
languages.original_text:
"...But the beast was not yet vanquished.
Roaring, his body he threw
into the fray
like a mighty spear-thrust,
Howling, his claws cut through the adamantine,
The warriors fought,
a river of blood spilling.
Ulfar Thunderlung,
his battle song singing,
The black curse
his vicious rival echoing.
The warriors were clashing
when the cunning Aett-Vater..."

languages.text:
"... Doch das Untier war noch nicht besiegt.
Brüllend warf seinen Körper er
ins Gefecht
wie einen mächtigen Speer.
Heulend durchschnitten seine Krallen das Adamant,
die Krieger kämpften,
ganze Ströme von Blut wurden vergossen.
Ulfar Donnerlunge,
sein Kampflied singend,
sein wilder Rivale
den schwarzen Fluch wiederholend.
Krachend die Krieger kämpften,
als der listige Aett-Vater ..."

languages.text:
"Fakat canavar bozguna uğramamıştı henüz.
Kükreyerek salladı bedenini
Arbedenin ortasına,
Koca bir mızrak gibi.
Uluyarak geçirdi pençelerini adamantiyumdan.
Savaşçılar savaştı,
Ortalık kan gölüne döndü.
Savaş şarkısını söylerken
Ulfar Tufanciğer,
Gaddar rakibi de
Kara laneti yayıyordu.
Savaşçılar dövüştüğü sırada
Kurnaz Aett-Vater..."
languages.original_text:
"...But the beast was not yet vanquished.
Roaring, his body he threw
into the fray
like a mighty spear-thrust,
Howling, his claws cut through the adamantine,
The warriors fought,
